mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , A.RANDOM_ID , A.NAME , A.FIRSTNAME , A.LASTNAME , A.JOB , A.EMAIL , A.CALL , A.LOCATION , CASE WHEN B.PAGE_DESCRIPTION = 'MAIN' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END PAGE_MAIN_YN FROM RESUME_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCOUNT_MY_PAGE B ON A.ID = B.ID AND A.RANDOM_ID = B.RANDOM_ID WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND A.RANDOM_ID = #{randomId}
